name: Sébastien Broussaud
bio:
Senior AI Developper, Amplitude Studios – SEGA
 
Sébastien is a programmer with over 10 years of industry experience. He worked at Dontnod, Heliceum, and Lightbulbcrew before joining Amplitude Studios, always with a focus on Artificial Intelligence technologies and related software architecture.
He is currently working on Amplitude's Endless Space2 project, focusing on creating a complete AI for 4X Games.
